org.apache.juneau.serializer

Class WriterSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Context
      • org.apache.juneau.BeanContextable
        • org.apache.juneau.BeanTraverseContext
          • org.apache.juneau.serializer.Serializer
            • org.apache.juneau.serializer.WriterSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnnotationProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CsvSerializer, JsonSerializer, PlainTextSerializer, UonSerializer, XmlSerializer

    public class WriterSerializer
extends Serializer
    Subclass of Serializer for character-based serializers.
    • This class is thread safe and reusable.
    • Overview > juneau-marshall > Serializers and Parsers
    • Source

      • toString

        public final String toString(Object o)
        Identical to serialize(Object) except throws a RuntimeException instead of a SerializeException.

        This is typically good enough for debugging purposes.

        Parameters:
        o - The object to serialize.
        Returns:
        The serialized object.
